description: Details about received documents, including request audit information.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Received Document record ID.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CONTACT_SERIAL_NUM
columns.description: The unique contact serial number (CSN) of the Received Document contact. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: DOCUMENT_EXT
columns.description: UUID for this document

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ORIGIN_C_NAME
columns.description:
How the document was requested


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Request Via Ticket


Automated Document Request


Unsolicited Document

columns.name: DOCUMENT_DEP_ID
columns.description: ID of the login department where the user was logged in when the document request was initiated

columns.name: DOCUMENT_DESC
columns.description: Free text description of the contents of the document

columns.name: CEID
columns.description: The patient Care Everywhere ID used for this request

columns.name: STRUCT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Data type of the document being stored


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


CDA

columns.name: RECV_INST
columns.description: Instant the document was received from the remote organization

columns.name: DOC_KIND_C_NAME
columns.description:
The kind of document being stored here


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Outpatient Discharge Summarization Note


Inpatient Discharge Summarization Note


Transfer Summarization Note


Summarization of Episode Note


Referral Note


Quality Measure Report


Plan of care note


Risk Assessment Document


Labor and Delivery Summary

Supplemental Analytics

National healthcare survey panel NAMCS

Patient summary Document


Clinical Analytics


Transplant Episode Summary


Comprehensive Care Coordination Summary


Dialysis Summary


Oncology Summary


Genomics Summary


Health Plan Sourced Clinical Summary

columns.name: REQUEST_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
Reason for initiating the document request


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Other

PCP Review

columns.name: REQUEST_EXPLNATION
columns.description: Free text explanation for requesting the document

columns.name: REQUEST_VST_PRV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the provider record for the search if the contact has no provider. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_SER table.

columns.name: RECORD_CREATE_INST
columns.description: Instant of creation

columns.name: REC_CREATE_USR_ID
columns.description: User

columns.name: CONSENT_DOC_REC_ID
columns.description: If authorization was required for this document request then the ID of the document information record (DCS) for the authorization will be stored here.

columns.name: LETTER_CSN
columns.description: Stores the Contact Serial Number (CSN) of the patient contact where additional information in this received document record is stored.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: This item stores the referral record identifier for the referral on the local organization associated with this received document record.

columns.name: LETTER_ID
columns.description: This item stores the note record identifier of the letter associated with this received document record.

columns.name: LETTER_NUM
columns.description: Stores the letter number of the letter associated with this external document record. The letter number corresponds to a line number in EPT related group 20200 which stores patient letters.

columns.name: EOW_ID
columns.description: The In Basket message (EOW) that triggered this request.

columns.name: PAT_NAME
columns.description: Patient name column. When a document is received from an external system, it will contain certain metadata supplied by the sending system regarding the document. This column contains the patient name that was received in the document's metadata.

columns.name: PAT_FAMILY_NAME
columns.description: Patient family name column. When a document is received from an external system, it will contain certain metadata supplied by the sending system regarding the document. This column contains the patient's family name that was received in the document's metadata.

columns.name: PAT_NAME_SUFFIX
columns.description: Patient name suffix column. When a document is received from an external system, it will contain certain metadata supplied by the sending system regarding the document. This column contains the patient's name's suffix that was received in the document's metadata.

columns.name: PAT_CITY
columns.description: The patient city received as a part of a document from an external system.

columns.name: PAT_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Patient state column. When a document is received from an external system, it will contain certain metadata supplied by the sending system regarding the document. This column contains the patient's state that was received in the document's metadata.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PAT_ZIP
columns.description: The patient's postal code. When a document is received from an external system, it contains certain metadata supplied by the sending system regarding the document. This column contains the patient's postal code that was received in the document's metadata.

columns.name: PAT_COUNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The patient country received as a part of a document from an external system.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PAT_SEX_C_NAME
columns.description:
Patient sex column. When a document is received from an external system, it will contain certain metadata supplied by the sending system regarding the document. This column contains the patient's sex that was received in the document's metadata.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Female


Male


Unknown


Nonbinary


X


Other

columns.name: PAT_DOB_DT
columns.description: Patient date of birth column. When a document is received from an external system, it will contain certain metadata supplied by the sending system regarding the document. This column contains the patient's date of birth that was received in the document's metadata.

columns.name: SUBSET_TITLE
columns.description: Stores the title of the submission set received in an incoming Provide and Register message. Its value is supplied by the sending system.

columns.name: SUBSET_CMT
columns.description: Submission set comments column. This column stores the comments associated with a submission set received in an incoming Provide and Register message. Its value is supplied by the sending system.

columns.name: AUTHOR_ID
columns.description: Author ID column. This column stores the author ID associated with a document or submission set received in an incoming Provide and Register message. Its value is supplied by the sending system. This may be an ID from any codeset, and the codeset is not included in the document submission.

columns.name: AUTHOR_NAME
columns.description: Author name column. This column stores the author name associated with a document or submission set received in an incoming Provide and Register message. Its value is supplied by the sending system.

columns.name: PAT_DEST_ID
columns.description: The patient destination identifier for this external document received from the sending organization.

columns.name: DEST_LOC_DXO_ID
columns.description: The destination location organization record (DXO) ID to which the message is sent (set only if it is different from local organization record ID).

columns.name: DEST_LOC_DXO_ID_EXTERNAL_NAME
columns.description: Organization's external name used as the display name on forms and user interfaces.

columns.name: CE_TOKEN
columns.description: This column contains the patient Care Everywhere token from the source organization of the received document.

columns.name: CREAT_INST_DTTM
columns.description: Instant the received document was created in the sender organization

columns.name: PAT_SSN
columns.description: Patient's Social Security Number (SSN) from an incoming message.

columns.name: PAT_HOME_PH
columns.description: Patient's home phone number.

columns.name: PAT_WORK_PH
columns.description: Patient's work phone number from an incoming message.

columns.name: PAT_CELL_PH
columns.description: Patient's mobile phone number.

columns.name: SRC_LOC_DXO_ID
columns.description: The document source location organization ID from which the message is sent. It is set only if it is different from the source organization ID (I DXR 70).

columns.name: SRC_LOC_DXO_ID_EXTERNAL_NAME
columns.description: Organization's external name used as the display name on forms and user interfaces.

columns.name: ERX_CONTROLLED_YN
columns.description:
This column indicates whether the external e-prescription accepted through the incoming e-prescribing interface is for a controlled substance.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: INC_CONTEXT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The context of the submission set that contains the documents for a received Provide and Register message. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Referral


Discharge


General Communication


Patient Initiated


Emergency Discharge


Inpatient Discharge


Unknown


Not Specified


Medication Adherence Message


Share Everywhere Message


Healthy Planet Link Upload


Update Notification


External Order Processing Request


Public Health Reporting


Admission Event Notification


Discharge Event Notification


Referral Outcome


Referral Interim Note


Outpatient Event Notification


General Event Notification

columns.name: AUTHOR_ADDRESS
columns.description: This item stores the address of the document author.

columns.name: AUTHOR_PHONE
columns.description: This item stores the phone number of the document author.

columns.name: PAT_HOUSENUMBER
columns.description: Patient's house number from an incoming message.
